name: fiscal
description: Computes fiscal quarter and year date ranges

scripts.dist: browserify index.js --standalone Fiscal -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o fiscal.min.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs fiscal.min.js --screw-ie8 --preamble "/* Fiscal by Mark Herhold - MIT Licensed */" -o fiscal.min.js

author: Mark Herhold <mherhold@rti.org>
